Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

The Ray of Hope:
   Is moving towards a Jupiter takeing the blows of tthe little armada of ships. It soon hides inside Jupiters Shadow to use it as a Diversion. Then sets its engine to full power and plots a cokurse for eath at litght speed. When it gets into orbit of eath it releases a ship to travel to the planet. The remainder of it Changes into a base like structure and makes it's decent to the planets surface. Hiding itself on the planet.

Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
OOC: Quite a hopeless situation but you can try.

Bic:

Unicron's Minion do not even need an order; they know they are made 
to protect their master at any cost...

While some of them perish in the concentrated fire, the remaining 
thousands quickly enter the fray and move in a dispersive maneuver. 
This leaves Unicron relatively open to attacks, but the pretentious 
ones would not even damage the Huge Robot.

The Minions return fire on the ship and many of them prepare even 
more devastating batteries of energy. If no one ever knew why Unicron 
ate whole planets, the Ray of Hope would soon know...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> The Ray stops just outside the Solarsystem out of Unicrons Reach. 
It appears to be a ship of some sort. About the same size of Unicron. 
The ship seems to have a Life source on it. The signal of the 
frequency seems to be that of a Transformer. the ship then moves 
slowly into Range and starts it's attack on unicron. sending out a 
pulse beam targeting Unicrons fleet of ships.
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Unicron felt the incoming ray, and 
he did not want to take any 
> chances. Within moments, a massive army of Minions were orbiting 
> around him, ready to open fire on whatever that was. Lunekill and 
> Rockseeker had better give results soon...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > A Light beam seems to be traveling fast from somewhere in 
> deepspace. The Trajectory seems to be towards Unicron this ray 
seems 
> to be of a frequency Not know  in any Database of any world that 
> Unicron has ever Seen. It is closing Fast on him.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >
